ti:translation.ti:label: How To Profit From One's Enemies
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. II. Babbitt, Frank Cole, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1928 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: How a man may receive advantage and profit from his enemies.
